package method;
Q1)
interface First
{
	void disp1();
	
}
class second
{
	void fun1()
	{
		System.out.println("in fun1");
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		second s=new second();
		First ref=s::fun1;
		ref.disp1();
	}
}


Q2)package method;
interface Third
{
	void show(int num);
}
class sample
{
	void disp(int num)
	{
		System.out.println("in fun1"+num);
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		sample s=new sample();
		Third ref=s::disp;
		ref.show(500);
	}

}



Q3)
package method;
interface Fifth
{
	int add(int a,int b);
}
class Math1
{
	int calc(int a,int b)
	{
		return a+b;
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Math1 m1= new Math1();
		//lambda expression
		Fifth ref1=(a,b)->{return (a+b);};
		System.out.println(ref1.add(10, 20));
		
		
		//method reference
		Fifth ref=m1::calc;
		System.out.println(ref.add(500,200));
	}

}




Q4)
package method;
interface Sixth
{
	void disp5();
}
class Sample
{
	static void fun1()
	{
		System.out.println("in fun1");
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		
		//method reference
		Sixth ref=Sample::fun1;
		ref.disp5();
	}

}





Q5)
package method;
interface Emp
{
	void show();
}
class MyClass
{
	MyClass()
	{
		System.out.println("inside def consturctor");
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		MyClass e1=new MyClass();
		Emp ref=MyClass::new;
			//ref.show();
	}

}




Q6)
package method;
interface Seventh
{
	void fun(int k);
}
class sample
{
	sample(int k)
	{
		System.out.println("inside parameterized constructor of sample\t" +k);
	}
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		
		Seventh ref=sample::new;
		ref.fun(200);
			
	}

}



Q7)
package method;
interface MyInterface
{
	void show(student ref);
}
class student
{
	private String name;
	private int age;
	
	public String getName() {
		return name;
	}

	public void setName(String name) {
		this.name = name;
	}
	
	public int getAge() {
		return age;
	}
	
	public void setAge(int age) {
		this.age = age;
	}

	@Override
	public String toString() {
		return "student [name=" + name + ", age=" + age + "]";
	}
	
	
}
public class demo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
	
		student s1=new student();
			s1.setName("vijay");
			s1.setAge(20);
	
		MyInterface ref=System.out::println;
		ref.show(s1);
	}

}
